tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE wine_reviews (
    review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    wine_name VARCHAR(255),
    winery_name VARCHAR(255),
    reviewer_name VARCHAR(255),
    review_date DATE,
    rating INT
);

CREATE TABLE WineReviews (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  reviewer_name VARCHAR(255),
  wine_name VARCHAR(255),
  rating FLOAT,
  review_text TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Reviewers (
  reviewer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  reviewer_name VARCHAR(255),
  email VARCHAR(255),
  country VARCHAR(50),
  join_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE wine_reviews (
 review_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
 user_name VARCHAR(50),
 wine_name VARCHAR(100),
 rating FLOAT,
 review_text TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE wine_regions (
 region_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
 region_name VARCHAR(50),
 country VARCHAR(50),
 climate VARCHAR(50),
 soil_type VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE wine_varieties (
 variety_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
 variety_name VARCHAR(50),
 color VARCHAR(20),
 acidity FLOAT,
 body VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE Wine (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    type VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    country VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    vintage INTEGER NOT NULL,
    region VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE Review (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    wine_id INTEGER NOT NULL,
    rating INTEGER NOT NULL,
    reviewer VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    review_text TEXT NOT NULL,
    taste_notes TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Rating (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    wine_id INTEGER NOT NULL,
    rating INTEGER NOT NULL,
    reviewer VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    date_reviewed DATE NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE Region (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    country VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    climate VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    terrain VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE Wines (
    wine_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    wine_name TEXT,
    wine_type TEXT,
    wine_region TEXT,
    wine_year INT
);

CREATE TABLE Ratings (
    rating_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    wine_id INT,
    taster_id INT,
    rating DECIMAL(3, 2),
    tasting_notes TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (wine_id) REFERENCES Wines(wine_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (taster_id) REFERENCES Tasters(taster_id)
);
